data.question: What is the chemical formula for the compound UWDM-2?
At what temperature was the static spectrum for UWDM-1 acquired?
What is the relationship between the motion of the macrocycle in UWDM-1 and UWDM-3?
data.answer: The motions in UWDM-1 and UWDM-3 are similar at lower temperatures.

data.question: Is the motion of the macrocycle in α-UWDM-3 more or less hindered compared to UWDM-1?
What type of motion does the macrocycle undergo in β-UWDM-3 at high temperatures?
data.answer: Full rotation combined with two-site jumps

data.question: Does the macrocycle in UWDM-2 undergo full rotation?
data.answer: No, it undergoes two-site jumps and partial rotation motions.

data.question: True or False: The macrocycle in UWDM-2 is more mobile than in α-UWDM-3.
True or False: The β-phase of UWDM-3 is prepared by adding DMF solvent.
What causes the β-phase of UWDM-3 to have a less constrained environment for the macrocycle?
True or False: The two-site jump motion in UWDM-2 occurs at a higher rate than partial rotation.
What is the maximum possible narrowing caused by the two-site jump model?
data.answer: Half the width of the static pattern in the SML

data.question: True or False: The spectrum of UWDM-1 at 480 K was simulated using a model of full rotation of the crown ether ring.
What is the role of the two-site jump model in the simulation of UWDM-3 dynamics?
data.answer: It describes the motion of the CH2 groups rotating about an axis in the plane of the ring.

data.question: True or False: The large-amplitude ring flexing in α-UWDM-3 results in favorable interactions between two rings.
What is the effect of desolvation on the structure of UWDM-3?
data.answer: It causes a change in the structure of the MOF, making the ring more mobile.

data.question: True or False: The motional model for UWDM-2 includes large-amplitude ring flexing.
What is the significance of the two-site jump angle in the simulation of UWDM-2 dynamics?
data.answer: It describes the rotation of the CH2 groups and influences the appearance of the 2H SSNMR powder patterns.

data.question: True or False: The motional models for UWDM-1 and UWDM-3 are identical.
How does the motional regime affect the 2H SSNMR powder patterns?
data.answer: Motions in different regimes (SML, IMR, FML) produce distinct changes in the powder patterns.

data.question: True or False: The simulation of high-temperature data for β-UWDM-3 uses a model of full rotation about an axis of Cn≥3 symmetry.
